documentation.text:
The WarpVaultSCI contract an abstract contract the WarpControl contract uses to interface
with a WarpVaultSC contract.*

@notice Accrue interest then return the up-to-date exchange rate
@return Calculated exchange rate scaled by 1e18*

The WarpVaultSCI contract an abstract contract the WarpControl contract uses to interface
with a WarpVaultSC contract.*

@notice Accrue interest then return the up-to-date exchange rate
@return Calculated exchange rate scaled by 1e18*

params._borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset to borrow

_repayLiquidatedLoan(address,address,uin.details: this function uses the onlyWC modifier which means it can only be called by the Warp Control contract*

params._amount: is the amount of StableCoin being repayed
params._borrower: is the address of the borrower who took out the loan
params._liquidator: is the address of the account who is liquidating the loan

params.account: The address whose balance should be calculated after updating borrowIndex
The address whose balance should be calculated after updating borrowIndex

_borrow(uint256,address).notice: Sender borrows stablecoin assets from the protocol to their own address

_repayLiquidatedLoan(address,address,uin.notice: repayLiquidatedLoan is a function used by the Warp Control contract to repay a loan on behalf of a liquidator

borrowBalanceCurrent(address).notice: Accrue interest to updated borrowIndex and then calculate account's borrow balance using the updated borrowIndex

borrowBalancePrior(address).notice: returns last calculated account's borrow balance using the prior borrowIndex

exchangeRateCurrent().notice: Accrue interest then return the up-to-date exchange rate

userdoc.notice: The WarpVaultSCI contract an abstract contract the WarpControl contract uses to interface with a WarpVaultSC contract.*
